23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Hearing and obeying is required from every Muslim man - in what he like and what he dislikes - as long as he is not ordered with disobedience. If he is ordered with disobedience, then no hearing or obeying is required of him." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from 'Ali, 'Imran bin Husain, and Al-Hakam bin 'Amr Al-Ghifari. This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ طَاعَةَ لِمَخْلُوقٍ فِي مَعْصِيَةِ الْخَالِقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: No Obedience To The Created In Disobedience To The Creator
